mapper.insert: insert into tem_outp_discharge_status( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, admission_number, tpatname, tpatno, visit_type, age, department_name, inpatient_area, room_no, bed_no, record_status, admission_date_time, tzy_days, cop_status, tzl_process, discharge_status, discharge_date_time, admission_diagnosis, discharge_diagnosis, treatment_effect, discharge_order, doctor_sign, record_date_time, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{admissionNumber}, #{tpatname}, #{tpatno}, #{visitType}, #{age}, #{departmentName}, #{inpatientArea}, #{roomNo}, #{bedNo}, #{recordStatus}, #{admissionDateTime}, #{tzyDays}, #{copStatus}, #{tzlProcess}, #{dischargeStatus}, #{dischargeDateTime}, #{admissionDiagnosis}, #{dischargeDiagnosis}, #{treatmentEffect}, #{dischargeOrder}, #{doctorSign}, #{recordDateTime}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
